snippet: Monica Bill Barnes and Anna Bass play a cross between themselves and two hapless businessmen in this a new weekly dance show downtown.
abstract: Siobhan Burke reviews weekly dance show Happy Hour, choreographed by Monica Bill Barnes and performed by Barnes and Anna Bass, at Gibney Dance: Agnes Varis Performing Arts Center.
lead_paragraph: Monica Bill Barnes and Anna Bass play a cross between themselves and two hapless businessmen in this a new weekly dance show downtown.

headline.print_headline: Two Insecure Guys at an Office Party Try Hitting On the Audience, and It Works
headline.main: Review: ‘Happy Hour’ Hosts a Make-Believe Office Party
